DataElement.preferredName: Grooved Pegboard Test Hand Dominant Assessment Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the total score related to an evaluation of the dominant hand using a grooved pegboard test.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Grooved Pegboard Test Hand Dominant Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to an assessment (the final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of) of a grooved pegboard test (a manipulative dexterity test using a pegboard device with five rows of five holes) and the dominant (exercising influence or control) hand (the distal portion of the upper extremity).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A manipulative dexterity test using a pegboard device wiht five rows of five holes.  It features 25 key-style pegs with holes in various positions in space, and is especially good for testing lateralized brain damage.

Concepts.definition: A manipulative dexterity test using a pegboard device with five rows of five holes. It features 25 key-style pegs with holes in various positions in space, and is especially good for testing lateralized brain damage.

Property.preferredDefinition: The distal portion of the upper extremity. It consists of the carpus, metacarpus, and digits. :Exercising influence or control.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: The distal portion of the upper extremity. It consists of the carpus, metacarpus, and digits.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
